text: The Carey Treatment is a 1972 mystery thriller movie directed by Blake Edwards and based on the 1968 novel A Case of Need by Michael Crichton. It stars James Coburn, Jennifer O'Neill, Pat Hingle, Elizabeth Allen, John Fink, James Hong and Jennifer Edwards and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1972 crime thriller movies Category:1972 mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Blake Edwards Category:Movies set in Boston Category:Movies about abortion Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:1970s American crime movies Category:Mystery thriller movies
title: The Carey Treatment
